name: To-Do app
body:
#TO-DO app
This app demonstrates my learning curve using some of the last technologies on the front-end side. Gulp ( a task automata for the front-end app ), SASS ( using modular architecture ) and ANGULAR ( with the primary use $resource and ui-router).

##GULP
It is a build system to automate tasks. The file is in progress and DEPLOYMENT task has not been develop yet as I prioritise PRODUCTION tasks at the minute.

##SASS
Applied [SMACS](https://smacss.com/), a modular architecture which allows to reuse CSS across the project.

##ANGULAR
Followed [John Papa](https://github.com/johnpapa/angular-styleguide) style-guides to be able to write a more consistent and reusable abstract/OOP code.

##GIT
All the stable code will be in MASTER. I will branch the next features of the app and merge them when they are stable enough.

##THIRD PARTY
* [Font Squirell](http://www.fontsquirrel.com/) - Allows to embed fonts in css file with a good render without the need of using JS.
* [Iconic-font](https://useiconic.com/open/) - Opens source icons.
* [Json-server](https://github.com/typicode/json-server) - Used to handle locally $resource request from db.json file.
